Question
========

The heart rate before and 15 minutes after prolonged strenuous exercise was measured, with the results being:

  --------------- ---- ---- ---- ---- ---- Person 1 2 3 4 5 Heart rate before 70 65 81 57 74 Heart rate a 75 64 86 59 79 --------------- ---- ---- ---- ---- ----

We want to test whether the difference between the average heart rate after and before exercise is equal to 0, using a paired T test. The critical area when testing with 5% two-sided risk is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* < -∞,-2.7764] ∪ [2.7764, ∞ >
* < - ∞,-2.5706] ∪ [2.5706, ∞ >
* < -2.3060, 2.3060 >
* < -2.5706, 2.5706 >

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* < -∞,-2.7764] ∪ [2.7764, ∞ >: Correct
* < - ∞,-2.5706] ∪ [2.5706, ∞ >: Incorrect
* < -2.3060, 2.3060 >: Incorrect
* < -2.5706, 2.5706 >: Incorrect
